protocol.name: P-G680-1
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a Conviron chamber under continuous light with fluorescent lamps at 20oC and 50% - 70% relative humidity.

protocol.name: P-G680-2
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared using the ENZO BioArray High Yield RNA Transcript Labeling Kit (Farmingdale, NY).

protocol.name: P-G680-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the Hot Borate Method [Stones et. al. PNAS vol 98 no 20: 11806-11811 (2001)]
